Package co.edu.escuelaing.reflexionlab

Class HelloService

java.lang.Object
co.edu.escuelaing.reflexionlab.HelloService
public class HelloService extends Object
A service class that provides various HTTP GET endpoints and static file serving. Annotated with RestController to denote that this class handles HTTP requests.

      public static String time()
      Handles GET requests to "/time".
      Returns:
      the current time

    • greeting

      public static String greeting(String name)
      Handles GET requests to "/greeting". Uses a request parameter "name" to customize the greeting message.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to include in the greeting
      Returns:
      a personalized greeting message

    • uuid

      public static String uuid()
      Handles GET requests to "/uuid".
      Returns:
      a unique identifier

      Returns:

    • dayOfWeek

      public static String dayOfWeek()
      Handles GET requests to "/dayofweek".
      Returns:
      the current day of the week

    • serveIndex

      public static String serveIndex()
      Handles GET requests to "/". Serves the index.html file.
      Returns:
      the content of index.html

    • serveStatic

      public static String serveStatic(String fileName)
      Handles GET requests to "/staticfile". Serves the specified static file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to serve
      Returns:
      the content of the specified file
